description: Addition of a second storey above existing roofline, insertion of a flank window at first and second floor levels, insertion of 2 rooflights to front roofslope, erection of a dormer extension in rear roofslope created, erection of a single storey rear extension and erection of a glazed lean-to to side of dwellinghouse.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of five years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - All new external work, to include stonework, brick bond and pointing, shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture those of the existing building, unless otherwise specified in the approved application.

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policies EN1 and EN13 [and EN31 if in a CA] of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan 2000.

Condition : 3 - Where slate is annotated on the approved drawings, natural slate shall be used.

Reason: To safeguard the special character of the building and the Conservation Area in accordance with the requirements of policy EN31 of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan (UDP) 2000.

Condition : 4 - Before the use of the glazed side extension hereby approved, details shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority, to demonstrate how excessive light spillage and overlooking from the premises will be avoided. Works shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details and thereafter permanently retained.

Reason:To safeguard the residential amenity of the occupiers at number 49 Roderick Road in accordance with the requirements of policy EN19 of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan (UDP) 2000.

Condition : 5 - The rooflight in the flat roof of the single storey rear extension hereby approved, shall contain only obscure glazing and be repaired and retained as such.

Reason:To safeguard the residential amenity of nearby occupiers in accordance with the requirements of policy EN19 of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan (UDP) 2000.
